title: Peaceful, affordable living 55+ Community
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Vintage at Seven Hills Senior Apartment Homes are luxury apartments for mature adults ages 55 and over.
Located in desirable Henderson, Nevada, our community offers spacious apartment homes with resort style amenities.
At Vintage you’ll find places to relax, entertain, and energize.

With countless amenities including a state of the art cardio and fitness center, entertainer’s clubhouse, monthly community events, and sparkling pool and spa, Vintage Senior offers luxury like nowhere else.
Living at Vintage at Seven Hills you’ll find yourself just minutes from premier shopping, dining and transit.
There’s so much to find at these luxury rentals, you’ll have to see it to believe it!
Come see our newly renovated community today!
$25.00 per pet fee $250.00 pet refundable deposit.
